DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess the safety and efficacy of QAV680 in patients with mild to moderate asthma
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy, Safety and Pharmacokinetics of QAV680 Versus Placebo in Patients With Asthma
DOC.criteria: Patients with moderate persistent asthma Smokers Any significant disease or illness, other than asthma Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
